data.name: The Merchant's Guide to the Kingdom
data.detailed_description: Ever wonder what it would be like to play as an NPC within an MMORPG world? Wonder no longer! You play as a humble merchant and quest giver in a kingdom filled with magic, mystery and danger. Take on the many tasks that one must do to maintain a thriving hero shop, hone your crafting abilities to sell and trade increasingly powerful items with other NPC’s and the many prospective heroes in your realm. Establish ongoing trade routes and fulfill deliveries to neighboring traders and vendors to increase your reputation and earn exclusive gifts. Create and manage your own guild to take on many dangers alongside the other AI driven heroes in the world with similar goals. Send your guild officers on grand quests either solo or with party members to battle their way through solo and group dungeons, seeking to find unique items that increase your heroes' strength across 17 different hero boosting stats. Use the most powerful gear to take on the greater dangers in the realm, including powerful world bosses, mysterious rare spawns, and massive raids calling for up to 40 brave heroes. Be warned, death waits for none in this realm, and should any hero perish, they are truly lost. Explore the realm and search for strange artifacts which lead to grand adventures containing wonderful prizes, large and small. Do all you can in the main campaign to aid in protecting the ancient and powerful Elemental Stones from any that seek to harm the balance.

data.short_description: You are an NPC and shopkeeper in an MMORPG world. Trade, craft and manage a guild to acquire the most powerful gear and face dangerous dungeons, world bosses, rare spawns and up to 40-man raids while following the campaign to aid in the protection of the ancient and powerful Elemental Stones.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo, AMD Athlon 64 Dual-Core 4000+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128 MB of Video RAM
  • Additional Notes: Requirements likely to change in future versions.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher, AMD Athlon X4 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 650 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Additional Notes: Requirements likely to change in future versions.
